summary: This is a forwarded email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated September 27, 2019, transmitting an attached document titled 'MCC Pros Memo' for review. The document appears to be internal prosecutorial correspondence related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, transmitting the 'MCC Pros Memo' for review.

events.title: Transmission of MCC Pros Memo
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards an attached prosecutorial memorandum for review.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 27, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The email transmits an attached document titled 'MCC Pros Memo' for review.
The correspondence originates from the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing prosecutorial activity related to the Epstein case.
The subject line 'MCC Pros Memo' likely refers to a prosecutorial memorandum concerning the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), where Epstein was held.
